original_title: ファイナル・ジャッジメント
overview: 26-year-old Shogo Washio sense danger from the expansion of Asian superpower nation Ouran. Shogo Washio teams up with Kenzo Nakagishi  and establishes a new political party. He loses in the elections to gain a seat in the house of representatives.  A few years later Japan is now invaded by the country of Ouran and falls under the military occupation of that country. Basic freedoms like speech and religion are lost, while protestors are killed. In this environment, Shogo Washio joins the underground resistance organization ROLE.
title: The Final Judgement
